page.title: 19Harpenden Brownies & Guides
page.content: We are in the 2nd Harpenden Brownies. We meet in the Guide Hut in Townsend Road. Our Brown Owl is Mrs Towner. We meet on a Friday and the Guides meet after us. We have a lot of fun. This year is a special year for us. The Brownie and Guide movement is 75 years old. We have been celebrating in many different ways. We have made collections of 75 different things which could fit into a camera film box. We had a Guide week in June. The flame was brought to Harpenden by helicopter and we had a procession through the High Street to Rothamsted Park where we stayed for a party. On Saturday we had a grand Carnival in Redbourn when Brownies and Guides from all over Hertfordshire met together for a day of activities, fun and enjoyment. It was a day to remember for the rest of our lives.
